import React from 'react' import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField' function Contacts () { const [state, setState] = React.useState({ Prenom: '', Nom: '', Email: '', Tel: '' }) const onChangeInput = (e) => { setState(Object.assign({}, state, { [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } return ( <>

Qui demande cette formation ?

) } export default Contacts
